**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 2.0 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** 1 --- This handheld snare drum is adorned with garish scenes of battle and triumph. When played, no matter what rhythm, it always gives the impression of a marching beat, invoking armies on the move. While playing the drums, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks and a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Drums of War **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 2.0 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1671)
  • **1st** [_force barrage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1536), [_mystic armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1611), [_sure strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709)
Drums of War (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 2.0 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **2nd** [_false vitality_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1523), [_noise blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1616), [_spiritual armament_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1687)
  • **3rd** [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1553), [_heroism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1555)
Drums of War (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 2.0 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonus to Performance checks is +2.
  • **4th** [_dispelling globe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1494), [_tortoise and the hare_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1021)
  • **5th** _dispelling globe_, [_quicken time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1187), [_synaptic pulse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1710)
name: Drums of War
